name: CMS of a restaurant website
description: A Content Management Systems app for a Restaurant where owner can post new dishes.

name: Employee Directory
description: It is an employee directory application developed with React using the ramdomuser API.

name: Workout Tracker
description: Workout app that allows the user to track the name, type, weight, sets, reps, and duration of exercise.

name: Password Generator
description: It is an application that generates a random password based on user-selected criteria.

name: Weather Dashboard
description: It is a simple weather dashboard app that runs in the browser and feature dynamically updated HTML and CSS.

name: Note Taker
description: Online application that can be used to write, save, and delete notes.
